dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 933 IH: Senator James L. Buckley Seashore Designation Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Malliotakis introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To designate the Staten Island Unit of the Gateway National Recreation Area as the Senator James L. Buckley Seashore.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Senator James L. Buckley Seashore Designation Act.

section.header: Designation of Senator James L. Buckley Seashore

subsection.text: The Staten Island Unit of the Gateway National Recreation Area described in subsection (a)(4) of the first section of Public Law 92â€“592 (16 U.S.C. 460cc) is designated as the Senator James L. Buckley Seashore.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, record, or other paper of the United States to the unit of the Gateway National Recreation Area described in subsection (a) shall be considered to be a reference to the Senator James L. Buckley Seashore.
